item.title: Automatic Valuation of Spanish Cadastre
item.description: Event name: Spatial Data Science Conference by Carto Date: 2021-10-28 URLs: Video Location: Online Summary: Talk at Spatial Data Science Conference 2021 by Carto.

item.title: Boosting Spanish Cadastre with Machine Learning
item.description: Event name: Madrid AI & Deep Learning URLs: Event Date: 2019-03-28 Location: idealista Headquarters Summary: In this talk I presented Catastro+.

item.title: Buscando Vocaciones
item.description: ![[appearances/2021/buscando-vocaciones/buscando-vocaciones.png]] Event name: Buscando Vocaciones Date: 2021-09-19 URLs: Site Video summary: Interview for Buscando vocaciones. I discuss how I got into Data Science, why Data Science is important for business and society and why I think analytics and programming skills will be important in the future.

item.title: Business Applications of Data Science
item.description: Event name: MBA - Universidad Autónoma de Madrid (UAM) Date: 2021-01-16 URLs: Slides Summary: In this talk I share my views on practical issues on Data Science projects and how to use the optimal skills and tools to solve business questions.

item.title: Data Science beyond the Hype
item.description: Event name: Nova event Date: 2021-05-25 URLs: Video Location: Online Summary: You probably have heard that data is the new oil and all the hype about Artificial Intelligence.

item.title: Data Science Sin Humo
item.description: Event name: Nuclio Digital School event URLs: Event Video Slides Date: 2022-04-22 Location: Online Summary: Introduction to Data Science without bells and whistles

item.title: Datos cruzados
item.description: Event name: Datos cruzados Date: 2022-06-24 Location: La Pipa - Gijón Summary: Evento organizado junto a La Pipa, Bedrock y Remotive para debatir sobre cómo Data Science y Product Management pueden trabajar de una forma más exitosa.

item.title: Doing Data Science: Lessons Learned
item.description: Event name: Programa Nuevos Profesionales Digitales URLs: Video Date: 2020-11-05 Location: Online Summary: Seminar on practical lessons learned while using Data Science.

item.title: El futuro inmediato (y real) de la Inteligencia Artificial
item.description: Event name: Openexpo Date: 2021-06-08 URLs: Video Location: Online Summary: You probably have heard that data is the new oil and all the hype about Artificial Intelligence.

item.title: Está la casa de mis sueños sobrevalorada o es un chollo
item.description: Event name: Enel Ninja Talk Date: 2022-10-06 Location: Enelx - Online event Summary: In this talk I present data initiatives at idealista such as those lead by idealista/data, /maps, /energy…

item.title: Interview at podcast xTalks.AI
item.description: Event name: xTalks.AI Date: 2021-12-02 URLs: Podcast

item.title: Lecciones aprendidas haciendo Ciencia de Datos
item.description: Event name: Lecciones aprendidas haciendo Ciencia de Datos URLs: Event Date: 2022-01-26 Location: Escuela Politécnica Industrial - Universidad de Oviedo Summary: Seminar on practical lessons learned while using Data Science abstract: In this talk, we will talk about types of projects that are done in private companies, with a special focus on how we use data in idealista.

item.title: Lecciones Aprendidas haciendo productos de datos
item.description: Event name: Databeers XXX URLs: Event Video Date: 2019-09-19 Location: Google Campus Summary: My talk “Busco Pisco” was selected as one of the top Databeers talks and got me an invitation to speak again at the special event for the 30th Databeers edition.

item.title: Lecciones Aprendidas haciendo productos de datos
item.description: Event name: XI Jornadas de Usuarios de R URLs: Event Slides Date: 2020-02-20 Location: UNED - Madrid Summary: In this talk I explained what Spatial Autocorrelation is, how to test using R and introduced how Spatial Cross Validation should be done.

item.title: Lecciones Aprendidas haciendo productos de datos
item.description: Event name: Data on the Rocks URLs: Event Date: 2023-01-23 Location: Garaje de ideas, Madrid Summary: En esta charla comparto lecciones aprendidas haciendo productos de datos relacionadas con la importancia de la calidad del dato, cómo integrar distintos perfiles en el diseño y desarrollo de estos productos, y qué dificultades tienen los usuarios para entender las funcionalidades basadas en algoritmos avanzados.

item.title: ML en modelos hedónicos de valoración inmobiliaria
item.description: Event name: Inteligencia Artificial Aplicada a Servicios Financieros Date: 2022-06-17 Location: Banco de España Summary: Presentación de paper sobre modelos hedónicos abstract: En esta charla presento un paper sobre modelos hedónicos aplicados a la valoración de inmuebles residenciales y discuto los retos actuales de tener este tipo de modelos en producción.

item.title: Podcast Pensamiento Digital
item.description: Event name: Proyectos de Ciencia de Datos URLs: Podcast Date: 2020-07-12 Location: Online Summary: Charla con Frankie Carrero en su podcast sobre Data Science, tipos de proyectos que se llevan a cabo en la industria y la formación necesaria para poder dedicarse a ellos.

item.title: Using location Data to create amazing user experiences online
item.description: Event name: Using location Data to create amazin user experiences online URLs: Event Video Date: 2022-04-22 Location: Online Summary: Talk and Panel discussion in Geoawesome Meetup.
